name: Sangria Slushie
description: Picture this: you, your pals, and a pitcher of this frosty delight. There’s no better way to lounge by the pool or kick back on the patio. It’s like summer in a glass, bursting with fruit flavours and chill vibes. One sip and you’ll practically hear the beach waves. So, let’s blend up some fun!
preparation: In a blender, add drink mix, wine, ice cubes, and strawberries. Blend until smooth. Evenly divide between 6 glasses. Serve immediately.
tips: For a mocktail version, use de-alcoholized wine.
